fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a verb to give to someone, the host will give them a custom Ability based on the selected adjective, at a limited ammo amount the host deems balanced.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may self-target once, the verb you give yourself will not count for your goal.
- If a player dies with a verb, it will be shown on their death reveal.
- 1x Basic Autovest.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make sure 3 of your verbs affect the game in some way. (Causing a death, Protecting someone, Giving info)
